WorkItem.Description:
The default gemming templates provided by the tree module are imo fairly ridiculous: The only used yellow stat (in terms of gem color) is intellect, and none of the templates includes haste.
Â 
According to http://elitistjerks.com/f73/t88836-restoration_itemization_thread_3_3_a/ , a druid would gem 
a) all red (sp)
b) use sp for red, spirit/sp for blue and haste/sp for yellow sockets to get good bonuses or
c) use some haste/sp gems to get to the haste cap and then use either of the above strategies.
